mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO (USER_ID, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONE, TOTAL_POINT, WITHDRAW, PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, CREATED_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_USER_INFO.nextval, #{loginId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, 0, 0, #{profileImageUrl}, #{createdDate})
mapper.select: SELECT LOGIN_ID FROM USER_INFO WHERE LOGIN_ID = '${value}'
SELECT USER_ID, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, WITHDRAW FROM USER_INFO WHERE LOGIN_ID = #{loginId}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET NAME = '탈퇴회원', PHONE = '00000000000', TOTAL_POINT = 0, WITHDRAW = 1, PROFILE_IMAGE_URL = 'DEFAULT URL' WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONE, TOTAL_POINT, PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, CREATED_DATE FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT ACTIVITY_TITLE, POINT, TO_CHAR(CREATED_DATE AT TIME ZONE 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATED_DATE FROM POINT_HISTORY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT S.TITLE, S_HIST.POINT, TO_CHAR(S_HIST.CREATED_DATE AT TIME ZONE 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATED_DATE FROM SUPPORT S, SUPPORT_HISTORY S_HIST WHERE S.SUPPORT_ID = S_HIST.SUPPORT_ID AND S_HIST.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT V.TITLE, V.VOLUNTEER_END_DATE, U_V.VERIFIED FROM VOLUNTEER V, USER_VOLUNTEER U_V WHERE V.volunteer_id = U_V.volunteer_id AND U_V.user_id = #{userId} AND U_V.status = 1
